text: Shin Ryu-jin (; born April 17, 2001), known mononymously as Ryujin, is a South Korean singer, rapper and dancer. She is a member of the South Korean girl group Itzy, formed by JYP Entertainment in 2019. ==Early life== Shin Ryu-jin was born on April 17, 2001, in Seoul, South Korea. While in middle school, she was cast by JYP Entertainment at a Got7 concert. She attended highschool at Hanlim Multi Art School, where she studied Musical Theatre, alongside her groupmate Chaeryeong. ==Career== ===2017: Pre-debut=== In 2017, Ryujin appeared on the reality competition MixNine.https://www.osen.co.kr/article/G1110822703 She also participated on the first episode of Stray Kids, alongside her future groupmates Yeji, Chaeryeong, and Yuna. In the same year, she featured in BTS' "Love Yourself" highlight reel, alongside groupmate Yuna, and appeared in the political crime drama film, The King.https://www.newsen.com/news_view.php?uid=201908062200321910 ===2019â€“present: Debut with Itzy=== Ryujin officially debuted with Itzy in February 2019, with the release of their first single album, It'z Different, and a music video for its lead single "Dalla Dalla". In January 2024, Ryujin released a music video for her solo track "Run Away".https://www.nme.com/news/music/itzy-ryujin-run-away-solo-music- video-3562710 ===Composition credits=== Title Year Artist Album Composer Lyricist "Run Away" 2024 Ryujin Born To Be ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 2017 The King Jimin Bit part ===Music video appearances=== Year Song title Artist Notes 2017 "Love Yourself" BTS Appeared as a dance partner in the highlight reel ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Itzy members Category:JYP Entertainment artists Category:K-pop singers Category:Living people Category:Singers from Seoul
title: Ryujin (rapper)
